com.lizardtech.djvu

Interface DjVuInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Codec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bookmark, BSInputStream, CachedInputStream, DataPool, DjVmDir, DjVuAnno, DjVuBean, DjVuInfo, DjVuObject, DjVuPage, DjVuText, DjVuText.Zone, DjVuViewport, Document, GBitmap, GMap, GPixmap, GRect, IFFEnumeration, IWPixmap, JB2Codec, JB2Decode, JB2Dict, JB2Image, Line, Oval, Palette, Poly, Rect, Text, ZPCodec

    public interface DjVuInterface
    This interface should be implemented by all DjVu classes which use DjVuOptions. The standard is to implement this method, and then create a static method which creates an instance of the class and initializes the object copy of of DjVuOptions based on the argument passed to the creator.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    Bill C. Riemers
